Our second and final #CBCFNoPlanetB panel has concluded. I am so grateful to all our panelists and attentative audience. Thank you for engaging in dialogue with us. #CBCFALC19 https://t.co/j1qEFQLidP

“All of everything we do is for the love of the people. It’s about the collective we never about the I. In order for us to make effective change it has to be for the love of the people.” Michele Roberts #CBCFNoPlanetB #CBCFALC19
A fantastic group of #CBCFNoPlanetB panelists! https://t.co/GUokCHwMbQ

“We need more people of color in spaces like that. We are seeing more big green orgs engaging in state wide campaigns but they need to partner with us and our community voices.” Rev. Woodberry #CBCFNoPlanetB #CBCFALC19
“Don’t hold their tears because it will cause you to drown in the process of it.” Stephanie Gigidgbi @NRDC speaking on being one of the few people of color in white orgs #CBCFNoPlanetB #CBCFALC19

On navigating these white spaces: “hang tough be strong don’t let them push you out. This is a long term struggle and we need young people stepping up and speaking out.” @DrBobBullard #CBCFNoPlanetB #CBCFALC19

“The other issue when you talk about public housing and repairs you gotta make community organizing a priority. We need stronger coalition building in our localities.” Peggy Shepherd @weact4ej #CBCFNoPlanetB #CBCFALC19 https://t.co/eYDQ7xVFWP
“We want to make sure that water affordability is part of the conversation.” Peggy Shepherd @weact4ej #CBCFNoPlanetB #CBCFALC19
“Make sure you have climate justice and equity in that plan.” Dr. Wilson #CBCFNoPlanetB #CBCFALC19

“Show up at the planning commission the zoning boards. The loudest people in the room tend to be the ones they listen to.” @JennMcClellanVA on speaking out on ej issues in our communities. #CBCFALC19 #CBCFNoPlanetB
“What we’re facing right now is a new kind of triple threat. Fracking greenhouse emissions wood pellet plants.” Rev. Woodberry #CBCFNoPlanetB #CBCFALC19
We are now opening it up to questions from attendees. Have a question on an ej issue? Come ask!#CBCFALC19 #CBCFNoPlanetB https://t.co/lucSOIjAuS

“In order to really develop the kind of legislation and policies that will be just we also have to work with our partners. We need to create a strong body of folks supporting enviro issues and build that base in our communities.” Peggy Shepard @weact4ej #CBCFNoPlanetB #CBCFALC19

“When you look at who is in energy industries who owns the energy emerging companies— it’s white people. Part of it is on us to educate our community. If you don’t understand it how are you going to impact that change?” @JennMcClellanVA #CBCFNoPlanetB #CBCFALC19

Our Environmental Justice panel with @msalainabeverly @DrBobBullard Michele Roberts Peggy Shepard @weact4ej @JennMcClellanVA Dr. Nicky Sheats @SimplySJG Rev. Leo Woodberry & Dr. Sacoby Wilson has started! #CBCFNoPlanetB #CBCFALC19 https://t.co/n0Tff77I6T

Our distinguished moderator @msalainabeverly is taking us to church right now by leading the audience in repeating our environmental justice principles. You can read and comment on them here https://t.co/f3muvJQenq #CBCFNoPlanetB #CBCFALC2019 https://t.co/Of7lTOmgzc

“It is clear to educators when students don’t have climate justice in their communities they come to school in poor health and unable to learn. They have chronic absenteeism.” @PrincessRMoss of @NEAToday #CBCFNoPlanetB #CBCFALC19

“If there is no climate justice there can be no education justice. Climate change is not just about recycling and plastic straws. It impacts communities of color in a very specific way.” @PrincessRMoss #CBCFNOPLANETB #CBCALC19

I am grateful my dear friend @PrincessRMoss was able to stop by #CBCFNoPlanetB and offer some kind words and inspiring remarks to kick off our panel on why the ej and climate justice movement matters. #CBCFALC19 https://t.co/P2Wf52VQKa
HAPPENING NOW: #CBCFNoPlanetB panel 2 “Why the Environmental and Climate Justice Movement Matters” in room 202B https://t.co/qWlhXDax5U #CBCFALC19

Our first panel has concluded. I want to extend my heartfelt thanks and appreciation to all our phenomenal panelists. And to all the attendees in the room thank you for your engagement and thoughtful questions. #CBCFNoPlanetB #CBCFALC19 https://t.co/hr7MDKIqaI

“Due to systemic issues in the African American community we are between 6-10x more likely to have respiratory or asthma related issues than any other community. So beyond jobs. It is a public health crisis right now.” Terry Travis @evhybridnoire #CBCFALC19 #CBCFNoPlanetB
“It’s actually more expensive to pollute.” Dr. Sanders @PoweredbyEBCE #CBCFNoPlanetB #CBCFALC19

“Constituents consumers businesses non-profits all need to be at the table. We all need to be pushing the government forward and trying to get more support.” Nicole Collier @Nestle #CBCFNoPlanetB #CBCFALC19 https://t.co/7yIGIPoXbR

“We need to own businesses we need to create them. That to me is the best way to ensure the level of progress we want to see in our communities.” Dr. Deidre Sanders with @PoweredbyEBCE #CBCFALCNoPlanetB #CBCFALC19
“There are more clean jobs than fossil fuel jobs right now in almost every state. That means the clean industry is a total growth opportunity. “ John Bowman @NRDC #CBCFNoPlanetB #CBCFALC19

McEachin chief of staff @CapitolK_Aus is starting things off with opening remarks. She notes how important green collar jobs in Virginia and across the country. #cbcfNoPlanetB #cbcfalc19 https://t.co/l97g6N2FX5

We’re getting started with our esteemed panelists @HopperAbby from @SEIA John Bowman from @NRDC Terry Travis w/ @evhybridnoire Nicole Collier Young  @Nestle Dr. Deidre Sanders with @poweredbyebce Payton Wilkins and our moderator @cherie524 with GM #cbcfnoplanetB #cbcfalc19 https://t.co/MbZDRSCaxn
STARTING SOON: I am a honorary host of two environmental #CBCFNoPlanetB panels. The first one on the green collar economy starts at 130 TODAY in room 202B. Join us https://t.co/avHSzyIBP8
Today is the day! https://t.co/4EKENu4sDD
#cbcfnoplanetB

The second #NoPlanetBCBCF panel will be on the importance of the enviro and climate justice movement will include panelists @DrBobBullard @weact4ej @JennMcClellanVA and moderated by @msalainabeverly. RSVP here—> https://t.co/qWlhXDax5U. I hope to see you there!

This Thursday I am humbled to serve as a honorary host for 2 #NoPlanetBCBCF environmental panels as part of #CBCFALC19. One on green collar jobs includes representatives from @SEIA @Nestle @NRDC @evhybridnoire & @PoweredbyEBCE. https://t.co/avHSzyIBP8
